types.name: AccessPoint
types.description: An access point representing an item in a controlled vocabulary

types.name: AccessPointType
types.description: Access point types

types.name: Address
types.description: An address

types.name: Annotatable
types.description: A type that can be annotated

types.name: Annotation
types.description: An annotation

types.name: AnnotationEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type Annotation and a cursor item

types.name: AuthoritativeSet
types.description: A container for authoritative items such as historical agents

types.name: AuthoritativeSetEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type AuthoritativeSet and a cursor item

types.name: BigDecimal
types.description: An arbitrary precision signed decimal

types.name: Boolean
types.description: Built-in Boolean

types.name: Country
types.description: An item representing a country

types.name: CountryEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type Country and a cursor item

types.name: Cursor
types.description: A connection cursor

types.name: CvocConcept
types.description: An item representing a concept in a controlled vocabulary

types.name: CvocConceptDescription
types.description: A concept description with a specific language

types.name: CvocConceptEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type CvocConcept and a cursor item

types.name: CvocVocabulary
types.description: A vocabulary

types.name: CvocVocabularyEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type CvocVocabulary and a cursor item

types.name: DatePeriod
types.description: A date period

types.name: Described
types.description: An item with multilingual descriptions

types.name: Description
types.description: A language-specific item description

types.name: DocumentaryUnit
types.description: An archival unit

types.name: DocumentaryUnitDescription
types.description: An archival description with a specific language

types.name: DocumentaryUnitEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type DocumentaryUnit and a cursor item

types.name: Entity
types.description: An entity

types.name: HistoricalAgent
types.description: An historical agent

types.name: HistoricalAgentDescription
types.description: An historical agent description

types.name: HistoricalAgentEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type HistoricalAgent and a cursor item

types.name: ID
types.description: Built-in ID

types.name: Int
types.description: Built-in Int

types.name: Link
types.description: An item representing a connection between two or more other items, incorporating the context of that connection

types.name: LinkEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type Link and a cursor item

types.name: LinkType
types.description: Link types

types.name: Linkable
types.description: A type that can be linked to other items

types.name: Relationship
types.description: A related item, incorporating both a target and the link context

types.name: Repository
types.description: A repository or archival institution

types.name: RepositoryDescription
types.description: A repository description with a specific language

types.name: RepositoryEdge
types.description: A connection edge containing an item of type Repository and a cursor item

types.name: String
types.description: Built-in String

types.name: SystemEvent
types.description: A system event

types.name: Temporal
types.description: A type with descriptions that have temporal data

types.name: TemporalDescription
types.description: A language-specific item description with dates

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

types.name: annotations
types.description: A connection of items of type Annotation with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: authoritativeSets
types.description: A connection of items of type AuthoritativeSet with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: concepts
types.description: A connection of items of type CvocConcept with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: countries
types.description: A connection of items of type Country with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: documentaryUnits
types.description: A connection of items of type DocumentaryUnit with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: historicalAgents
types.description: A connection of items of type HistoricalAgent with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: links
types.description: A connection of items of type Link with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: repositories
types.description: A connection of items of type Repository with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor

types.name: vocabularies
types.description: A connection of items of type CvocVocabulary with paging information. A connection represents a sequence of items which can be paged via a cursor
